name: snowflake-platform
description: Build on Snowflakes AI Data Cloud with snow CLI, Cortex AI (COMPLETE, SUMMARIZE, AI_FILTER), Native Apps, and Snowpark. Covers JWT auth, account identifiers, Marketplace publishing.
